decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board through a variety of removal spells and counterspells while utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and LÃ³rien Revealed. It also includes powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Solitude to apply pressure on the opponent. With a mix of card advantage engines like Ephemerate and Snapcaster Mage, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and efficiently deal with threats. Additionally, the mana base is carefully crafted to support the three-color requirements of Jeskai Control.

The main concept of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, while also having a fast and aggressive game plan with efficient creatures like Nethergoyf and Emperor of Bones. The deck also includes powerful cards like Urza's Saga for additional value. With a focus on tempo and disruption, this deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent while maintaining control of the game.

The deck focuses on quickly and efficiently dealing damage to the opponent by leveraging cheap and aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Slickshot Show-Off, as well as burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart. The deck also includes cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration to maintain card advantage and selection. The goal is to apply constant pressure to the opponent while disrupting their game plan with removal spells and keeping the hand full of threats to close out the game quickly.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly play low-cost aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, while using spells like Lava Dart and Lightning Bolt to control the board and deal direct damage. Dragon's Rage Channeler helps provide card advantage, while Slickshot Show-Off allows for additional creature control. The deck also includes cards like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge to pump up your creatures and finish off opponents quickly. The goal is to overwhelm your opponent with fast, aggressive plays and maintain control of the board.

The deck focuses on aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Territorial Kavu, and Scion of Draco to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It includes efficient removal like Lightning Bolt and Leyline of the Guildpact to control the board. The deck also utilizes Leyline Binding and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to strengthen its creatures and apply relentless pressure. Additionally, cards like Nulldrifter, Stubborn Denial, and Consign to Memory provide versatility and disruption to keep the opponent on their toes. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its aggressive creatures and powerful synergy.

The deck focuses on utilizing creatures with powerful enter the battlefield effects and disruptive enchantments to control the board and pressure the opponent. By combining aggressive creatures like Ocelot Pride and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd with removal spells such as Solitude and Consign to Memory, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent while also disrupting their game plan. Key cards like Quantum Riddler and Sanctifier en-Vec help to disrupt the opponent's strategies and protect the deck's own threats. Additionally, cards like Guide of Souls and Starfield Shepherd provide value and recursion to maintain pressure on the opponent.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creature plays and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. Utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer for early pressure, alongside burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment for direct damage. The deck also includes cards like Blood Moon to disrupt opponents' mana base and Arena of Glory to buff creatures for additional damage. Overall, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain momentum throughout the game with efficient creature plays and burn spells.

The key concept of the deck is to utilize various Eldrazi creatures and synergistic support cards to create a powerful combo that can overwhelm the opponent quickly. The deck focuses on generating mana with Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga to cast big threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and Devourer of Destiny, while also using cards like Malevolent Rumble and Glaring Fleshraker to control the board. By establishing a strong board presence and generating value through creature interactions, the deck aims to outpace and outmuscle the opponent to secure victory.

The deck revolves around utilizing cards that can generate mana and quickly ramp up to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End. The key strategy involves using combos such as Blade of the Bloodchief and Malevolent Rumble to boost the power of your creatures, while also disrupting your opponent's game plan with cards like Pithing Needle and Soul-Guide Lantern. By efficiently assembling your pieces and overwhelming your opponent with massive Eldrazi threats, you aim to win the game before they have a chance to recover.

The main focus of this deck is to control the opponent's actions and limit their resources through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and hand disruption. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Negation, and Solitude, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and slow down their development. Additionally, the inclusion of Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional disruption and tempo advantage. The deck also has ways to deal with graveyard strategies with cards like Relic of Progenitus. Overall, the deck is designed to control the game and outvalue the opponent over the course of the match.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana and generate multiple land drops in order to quickly tutor for and cast Primeval Titan, allowing for explosive plays and searching for key lands like Vesuva or Tolaria West. Additionally, the deck utilizes cards like Amulet of Vigor and Lotus Field to generate even more mana and take advantage of land synergies, while also providing protection and support with cards like Boseiju, Who Endures. Ultimately, the goal is to assemble the right combination of lands and cards to achieve victory through powerful combo plays and overwhelming board presence.

This deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands to generate large amounts of mana quickly, allowing for powerful plays with cards like Karn, the Great Creator, and Ugin, Eye of the Storms. The deck also includes a variety of control elements such as Tezzeret, Cruel Captain and Engineered Explosives to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, the deck includes utility cards like Sylvan Scrying and Expedition Map to help find the necessary lands. The goal is to establish a dominant board presence while controlling the opponent's actions to secure victory.

The deck focuses on a proactive strategy that aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. It combines white control elements with aggressive red creatures and powerful disruptive spells to create a tempo advantage. By leveraging powerful cards like Teferi, Time Raveler, Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's plans while presenting a clock that closes out the game quickly. The deck also includes removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Solitude to deal with threats efficiently.

The deck revolves around using cards like Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker to generate value and control the board while setting up for a powerful combo finish with Emrakul, the Promised End and Eldrazi Temple. The deck also includes interaction with cards like Pithing Needle and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful finish, utilizing its unique synergies and efficient threats.

The main focus of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through a combination of counter spells, removal, and hand disruption. The deck aims to slow down the opponent's momentum and generate card advantage, ultimately overpowering them with threats like Murktide Regent and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares. The deck also utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student to further control the board and outvalue the opponent. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's strategy, this deck aims to dominate the game and secure victory.

The deck focuses on aggressive playstyle using fast and efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler to deal damage quickly. It utilizes low-cost spells like Lightning Bolt and Mutagenic Growth to control the board and push damage through. The deck also includes card draw and deck manipulation with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration to ensure consistent aggression. The mana base composed of fetch lands and dual lands allows for smooth mana fixing and fast plays. Flexibility in spells like Lava Dart and Violent Urge provide additional reach and removal options.
